title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1501.10 - Standards for compliance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1501.10 - Standards for compliance

State Regulations

The construction, installation, operation, and maintenance
of a new fire detecting system in accordance with the generally accepted
standards listed in the appendix to these rules and regulations[FN*], to the
extent that such standards are consistent with these rules and regulations, shall constitute compliance with this Part or any applicable provision
thereof. [FN*] See Appendix S-2. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1501.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
